00022 #ifndef __AUDACITY_ODTASKTHREAD__
00023 #define __AUDACITY_ODTASKTHREAD__
00024 #include <wx/thread.h>
00025 
00026 #include "../Audacity.h"   // contains the set-up of AUDACITY_DLL_API
00027 
00028 class ODTask;
00029 
00030 #ifdef __WXMAC__
00031 
00032 // On Mac OS X, it's better not to use the wxThread class.
00033 // We use our own implementation based on pthreads instead.
00034 
00035 #include <pthread.h>
00036 #include <time.h>
00037 
00038 class ODTaskThread {
00039  public:
00040    typedef int ExitCode;
00041    ODTaskThread(ODTask* task);
00042    /*ExitCode*/ void Entry();
00043    void Create() {}
00044    void Delete() {
00045       mDestroy = true;
00046       pthread_join(mThread, NULL);
00047    }
00048    bool TestDestroy() { return mDestroy; }
00049    void Sleep(int ms) {
00050       struct timespec spec;
00051       spec.tv_sec = 0;
00052       spec.tv_nsec = ms * 1000 * 1000;
00053       nanosleep(&spec, NULL);
00054    }
00055    static void *callback(void *p) {
00056       ODTaskThread *th = (ODTaskThread *)p;
00057 #if defined(__WXMAC__)
00058       /*return (void *)*/ th->Entry();
00059       return NULL;
00060 #else
00061       return (void *) th->Entry();
00062 #endif
00063    }
00064    void Run() {
00065       pthread_create(&mThread, NULL, callback, this);
00066    }
00067    
00070    void SetPriority(int priority)
00071    {
00072       mPriority=priority;
00073    }
00074 
00075  private:
00076    int mPriority;
00077    bool mDestroy;
00078    pthread_t mThread;
00079 
00080    ODTask* mTask;
00081 };
00082 
00083 class ODLock {
00084  public:
00085    ODLock(){
00086       mutex = (pthread_mutex_t *) malloc (sizeof (pthread_mutex_t));
00087       pthread_mutex_init (mutex, NULL);
00088    }
00089  
00090    void Lock()
00091    {
00092       pthread_mutex_lock (mutex);
00093    }
00094 
00095    void Unlock()
00096    {
00097       pthread_mutex_unlock (mutex);
00098    }
00099    
00100    virtual ~ODLock()
00101    {
00102       pthread_mutex_destroy (mutex); 
00103       free(mutex);
00104    }
00105   
00106 private:
00107    friend class ODCondition; //needs friendship for wait()
00108    pthread_mutex_t *mutex ;
00109 };
00110 
00111 class ODCondition 
00112 {
00113 public:
00114    ODCondition(ODLock *lock);
00115    virtual ~ODCondition();
00116    void Signal();
00117    void Broadcast();
00118    void Wait();
00119    
00120 protected:
00121    pthread_cond_t *condition;
00122    ODLock* m_lock;
00123 };
00124 
00125 #else
00126

00128 class ODTaskThread : public wxThread  
00129 {
00130 public:
00133    ODTaskThread(ODTask* task);
00134    
00135   
00136 protected:
00138    virtual void* Entry();
00139    ODTask* mTask;
00140    
00141 };

00144 //a wrapper for wxMutex.
00145 class AUDACITY_DLL_API ODLock : public wxMutex  
00146 {
00147 public:
00150    ODLock(){}
00151   virtual ~ODLock(){}   
00152 };

00155 {
00156 public:

00158    virtual ~ODCondition(){}
00159    //these calls are implemented in wxCondition:
